abstract: Applications can save the user money by monitoring mobile and Wi-Fi use, and even make comparisons with other users.
snippet: Applications can save the user money by monitoring mobile and Wi-Fi use, and even make comparisons with other users.
lead_paragraph: Data? Don’t talk to me about data. Mobile 4G data is the most expensive part of my smartphone habit. One recent morning, as I browsed Twitter in a coffee shop, everything stopped suddenly because I had already burned through the month’s data allowance. I had the option of waiting until January or paying about $4 for an extra 200 megabytes. Guess which I chose?

headline.main: Data Cops Guard Against Excessive Charges
